name: acknowledgedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is admitted or accepted to be true: I didn't order anything from the dessert menu, which features acknowedgedly shop-bought desserts. How can they justify holding acknowedgedly innocent men in a prison camp?
More examplesFewer examplesThe essay takes an acknowedgedly Utopian stance.Even in many acknowledgedly literate communities, remnants of oral modes of cultural communication continue to exist.With "live" albums, I believe a clearer distinction should be made between acknowledgedly recorded sound, and attempts to recreate an original performance.
